languages.text: "К сожалению, это невозможно. Маршал считает, что из всех Арбитес лишь проктор Антар обладает необходимой подготовкой, чтобы выполнить грядущую миссию. Едва ли такая мелочь, как недолгое отсутствие одного человека — между прочим, выданного вам во временное пользование самими Арбитес — способно нанести хоть какой-то ущерб делам династии".

traits.locale_text: "К сожалению, это невозможно. Маршал считает, что из всех Арбитес лишь проктор Антар обладает необходимой подготовкой, чтобы выполнить грядущую миссию. Едва ли такая мелочь, как недолгое отсутствие одного человека — между прочим, выданного вам во временное пользование самими Арбитес — способно нанести хоть какой-то ущерб делам династии".

languages.text: "Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, это невозможно. Маршал считает, что из всех Арбитес лишь проктор Антар обладает необходимой подготовкой, чтобы выполнить грядущую миссию. Едва ли такая мелочь, как недолгое отсутствие одного человека — между прочим, выданного вам во временное пользование самими Арбитес — способно нанести хоть какой-то ущерб делам династии".

traits.locale_text: "Sadly, that option is unavailable. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar has the required training for successfully completing this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — could be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

"Sadly, that option is unavailable. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar has the required training for successfully completing this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — could be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

"Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

"Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

"Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

"Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

languages.text: "Das ist leider keine Option. Der Marschall glaubt, dass aus den Reihen der Arbitratoren allein Proktor Anthar über die erforderliche Ausbildung verfügt, um diese Mission erfolgreich abzuschließen. Ich kann mir nicht vorstellen, dass die kurze Abwesenheit einer Person – die Euch vom Adeptus Arbites, wie ich Euer erinnern möchte, lediglich vorübergehend zur Seite gestellt wurde – den Angelegenheiten der Dynastie abträglich wäre."
languages.original_text: "Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist leider keine Option. Der Marschall glaubt, dass aus den Reihen der Arbitratoren allein Proktor Anthar über die erforderliche Ausbildung verfügt, um diese Mission erfolgreich abzuschließen. Ich kann mir nicht vorstellen, dass die kurze Abwesenheit einer Person – die Euch vom Adeptus Arbites, wie ich Euer erinnern möchte, lediglich vorübergehend zur Seite gestellt wurde – den Angelegenheiten der Dynastie abträglich wäre."

languages.text: « Malheureusement, c'est impossible. Le maréchal estime que parmi tous les arbitrators, seul le proctor Anthar possède les compétences nécessaires pour mener cette mission à bien. J'ai du mal à imaginer que l'absence d'une seule personne puisse nuire de quelque manière que ce soit aux affaires de votre dynastie, surtout celle d'un individu qui, je vous le rappelle, a été temporairement mis à votre disposition par l'Adeptus Arbites. »
languages.original_text: "Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, c'est impossible. Le maréchal estime que parmi tous les arbitrators, seul le proctor Anthar possède les compétences nécessaires pour mener cette mission à bien. J'ai du mal à imaginer que l'absence d'une seule personne puisse nuire de quelque manière que ce soit aux affaires de votre dynastie, surtout celle d'un individu qui, je vous le rappelle, a été temporairement mis à votre disposition par l'Adeptus Arbites. »

languages.text: “遗憾的是，这件事情您没有选择权。元帅认为，在全体法务官之中，只有安萨监察官接受过相关训练，他是带队的唯一人选。如果说，仅仅是一位随行人员的缺席，就会对王朝的事务造成任何损害，恐怕我很难想象这样的情形。不仅如此，还请允许我提醒您，安萨监察官是法务部临时委派给您的随行人员。”
languages.original_text: "Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

traits.locale_text: “遗憾的是，这件事情您没有选择权。元帅认为，在全体法务官之中，只有安萨监察官接受过相关训练，他是带队的唯一人选。如果说，仅仅是一位随行人员的缺席，就会对王朝的事务造成任何损害，恐怕我很难想象这样的情形。不仅如此，还请允许我提醒您，安萨监察官是法务部临时委派给您的随行人员。”

languages.text: «Lamentablemente, no es una opción. El Mariscal cree que, de todos los Arbitrator bajo su mando, solo el Procurador Anthar tiene el entrenamiento necesario para la misión. No puedo imaginar que la breve ausencia de un individuo, especialmente uno cuyos servicios le fueron prestados temporalmente por el Adeptus Arbites en primer lugar, tenga graves consecuencias para los asuntos de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente, no es una opción. El Mariscal cree que, de todos los Arbitrator bajo su mando, solo el Procurador Anthar tiene el entrenamiento necesario para la misión. No puedo imaginar que la breve ausencia de un individuo, especialmente uno cuyos servicios le fueron prestados temporalmente por el Adeptus Arbites en primer lugar, tenga graves consecuencias para los asuntos de la dinastía».

languages.text: 「残念ながら、その選択肢はありません。将帥は、アービトレイター部隊の中でこの任務を成功させるために必要な訓練を受けているのは、アンサール代理人ただ一人だと考えています。一人の人間、すなわち高等裁定局から一時的に派遣された者が不在になることで、王朝の業務に何らかの支障が出るとは到底考えられません」
languages.original_text: "Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、その選択肢はありません。将帥は、アービトレイター部隊の中でこの任務を成功させるために必要な訓練を受けているのは、アンサール代理人ただ一人だと考えています。一人の人間、すなわち高等裁定局から一時的に派遣された者が不在になることで、王朝の業務に何らかの支障が出るとは到底考えられません」

languages.text: "Maalesef mümkün değil. Miralay, tüm Yargıcı kuvvetleri içinde bu görevi başarıyla tamamlayacak eğitime yalnız Üsteğmen Anthar'ın sahip olduğunu düşünüyor. Ayrıca hatırlatırım ki hizmetleri Arbites tarafından size geçici olarak tahsis edilmiş tek bir kişinin kısa yokluğu, hanedanlığın işlerini aksatmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Sadly, that is not an option. The Marshal believes that out of the entire Arbitrator force, only Proctor Anthar possesses the training required to successfully complete this mission. I cannot imagine that the brief absence of one individual — whose services, may I remind you, were temporarily lent to you by the Adeptus Arbites — will be in any way damaging to the dynasty's affairs."

traits.locale_text: "Maalesef mümkün değil. Miralay, tüm Yargıcı kuvvetleri içinde bu görevi başarıyla tamamlayacak eğitime yalnız Üsteğmen Anthar'ın sahip olduğunu düşünüyor. Ayrıca hatırlatırım ki hizmetleri Arbites tarafından size geçici olarak tahsis edilmiş tek bir kişinin kısa yokluğu hanedanlığın işlerini aksatmayacaktır."
